description:
Write Terraform configuration for an AWS S3 bucket with the following requirements:

- Bucket name passed as a variable
- Server-side encryption enabled (AES256)
- Versioning enabled
- Block all public access
- Lifecycle rule: transition objects to GLACIER after 90 days, expire after 365 days
- Tags: Environment, Project, ManagedBy=terraform

Include the required AWS provider configuration pinned to a specific version.
